Posted By: Sironos (5/23/2010 1:43:45 PM)

posts.post_content:
If i'm going to play land destruction / land hate, I'm going to play *good* land hate... targeted land hate. Land destruction spells like [Stone Rain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stone Rain), or [Mwonvuli Acid-Moss](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mwonvuli Acid-Moss). Just compare this card with [Plow Under](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Plow Under). I dare you...  
  
Oddly enough, it gets around indestructible lands like [Darksteel Citadel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel Citadel), and things like [Terra Eternal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terra Eternal)
posts.html:
If i'm going to play land destruction / land hate, I'm going to play good land hate... targeted land hate. Land destruction spells like Stone Rain, or Mwonvuli Acid-Moss. Just compare this card with Plow Under. I dare you...

Oddly enough, it gets around indestructible lands like Darksteel Citadel, and things like Terra Eternal

Posted By: tcollins (2/2/2011 2:40:13 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Terrible in 1v1. They are obviously going to sacrifice a basic land, not the pesky nonbasic that you need to get rid of.  
  
Even in mutiplayer its not that good. It might set everyone back 1 land drop, but its going to be basic lands and your making allot of enemies. All that for 5 mana and 1 card.  
  
If it said, for each opponent, destroy one target land they control. This would be a solid card for multiplayer, and might even need to cost ![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol) extra.  
  
.5/5, this card is really poor.
posts.html:
Terrible in 1v1. They are obviously going to sacrifice a basic land, not the pesky nonbasic that you need to get rid of.

Even in mutiplayer its not that good. It might set everyone back 1 land drop, but its going to be basic lands and your making allot of enemies. All that for 5 mana and 1 card.

If it said, for each opponent, destroy one target land they control. This would be a solid card for multiplayer, and might even need to cost extra.

.5/5, this card is really poor.
